name: World Conference on English Literature and Linguistics
content: Step into the captivating realm of English Literature and Linguistics, where ideas intertwine, words come alive, and boundaries of knowledge are shattered. Join us at the upcoming the World Conference on English Literature and Linguistics (ELLCONF) as we delve deep into the fascinating world of literature and language, exploring thought-provoking questions and embracing the challenges that lie ahead. Prepare to be inspired, enlightened, and captivated by the power of words during the 23rd to 25th of August 2024 in the historic city of Oxford, UK. ELLCONF provides a unique opportunity to engage with fellow experts in the field, fostering intellectual exchange and collaboration. By bringing together ESL/EFL teachers, linguists, scholars, researchers, graduate students, and professionals, this conference aims to bridge the gap between theory and practice, pushing the boundaries of English literature and linguistics research.
